archimate:Requirement.name: 4.54.4 Collaboration platform content information management control
archimate:Requirement.documentation: Assurance should be provided over the integrity and confidentiality of content handled by collaboration platforms by: * using content management techniques (e.g. information classification, data validation, timestamping and content filtering) * appointing one or more content managers to maintain and monitor content * scanning content, including attachments, to detect malicious activity or accidental leakage of information.
